section_title: 32j12   Concurrently working for more than one employer.
text:
Where
two or more employers arrange to, and do, jointly employ an employee, the total
hours worked by the employee for the employers shall be added together to
determine the total number of hours worked in the workweek by the employee for
which straight time and OT should be paid.
